snippet: Facing condemnation from the West following the jailing of Yulia V. Tymoshenko, the Ukrainian government could decriminalize the law under which the opposition leader was prosecuted.
lead_paragraph: Facing condemnation from the West following the jailing of Yulia V. Tymoshenko, the Ukrainian government could decriminalize the law under which the opposition leader was prosecuted.

headline.main: Ukrainian Opposition Leader to Be Freed Soon, Daughter Says
headline.print_headline: Ukrainian Opposition Leader to Be Freed Soon, Daughter Says
headline.seo: Tymoshenko to Be Freed Soon, Her Daughter Says
